body.raw:
{
    "Author": "{{senderAddress}}",
    "Name": "Hello asset document {{cur-timestamp}}",
    "Description": "This is a blockchain record {{cur-timestamp}}",
    "Language": "en",
    "Jurisdiction": "EARTH",
    "CustomDefinitionItems": [
        {
            "Key": "mydata",
            "Type": "TEXT",
            "Value": "My Private documentation",
            "Name": "My Data",
            "SectionsPath": "[mydocumentation]",
            "SectionsPathNames": "[MyDocumentation]"
        },
        {
            "Key": "method",
            "Type": "STRING",
            "Value": "Hand writing",
            "Name": "Method",
            "SectionsPath": "[documentation][singlefile]",
            "SectionsPathNames": "[Documentation][single file]"
        }
    ]
}

exec: var datestring = timestamp.getFullYear() + "" + ("0" + (timestamp.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2) + "" + ("0" + timestamp.getDate()).slice(-2)  + "-" + ("0" + timestamp.getHours()).slice(-2) + "" + ("0" + timestamp.getMinutes()).slice(-2);
